snp3.11:679: Ānandajāte tidasagaṇe patīte,Sakkañca indaṁ sucivasane ca deve;Dussaṁ gahetvā atiriva thomayante,Asito isi addasa divāvihāre.
snp3.11:680: Disvāna deve muditamane udagge,Cittiṁ karitvāna idamavoca tattha;"Kiṁ devasaṅgho atiriva kalyarūpo,Dussaṁ gahetvā ramayatha kiṁ paṭicca.
snp3.11:681: Yadāpi āsī asurehi saṅgamo,Jayo surānaṁ asurā parājitā;Tadāpi netādiso lomahaṁsano,Kimabbhutaṁ daṭṭhu marū pamoditā.
snp3.11:682: Seḷenti gāyanti ca vādayanti ca,Bhujāni phoṭenti ca naccayanti ca;Pucchāmi vohaṁ merumuddhavāsine,Dhunātha me saṁsayaṁ khippa mārisā".
snp3.11:683: "So bodhisatto ratanavaro atulyo,Manussaloke hitasukhatthāya jāto;Sakyāna gāme janapade lumbineyye,Tenamha tuṭṭhā atiriva kalyarūpā.
snp3.11:684: So sabbasattuttamo aggapuggalo,Narāsabho sabbapajānamuttamo;Vattessati cakkamisivhaye vane,Nadaṁva sīho balavā migābhibhū".
snp3.11:685: Taṁ saddaṁ sutvā turitamavasarī so,Suddhodanassa tada bhavanaṁ upāvisi;Nisajja tattha idamavocāsi sakye,"Kuhiṁ kumāro ahamapi daṭṭhukāmo".
snp3.11:686: Ukkāmukheva sukusalasampahaṭṭhaṁ;Daddallamānaṁ siriyā anomavaṇṇaṁ,Dassesu puttaṁ asitavhayassa sakyā.
snp3.11:687: Disvā kumāraṁ sikhimiva pajjalantaṁ,Tārāsabhaṁva nabhasigamaṁ visuddhaṁ;Suriyaṁ tapantaṁ saradarivabbhamuttaṁ,Ānandajāto vipulamalattha pītiṁ.
snp3.11:688: Anekasākhañca sahassamaṇḍalaṁ,Chattaṁ marū dhārayumantalikkhe;Suvaṇṇadaṇḍā vītipatanti cāmarā,Na dissare cāmarachattagāhakā.
snp3.11:689: Disvā jaṭī kaṇhasirivhayo isi,Suvaṇṇanikkhaṁ viya paṇḍukambale;Setañca chattaṁ dhariyanta muddhani,Udaggacitto sumano paṭiggahe.
snp3.11:690: Paṭiggahetvā pana sakyapuṅgavaṁ,Jigīsako lakkhaṇamantapāragū;Pasannacitto giramabbhudīrayi,"Anuttarāyaṁ dvipadānamuttamo".
snp3.11:691: Athattano gamanamanussaranto,Akalyarūpo gaḷayati assukāni;Disvāna sakyā isimavocuṁ rudantaṁ,"No ce kumāre bhavissati antarāyo".
snp3.11:692: Disvāna sakye isimavoca akalye,"Nāhaṁ kumāre ahitamanussarāmi;Na cāpimassa bhavissati antarāyo,Na orakāyaṁ adhimānasā bhavātha.
snp3.11:693: Sambodhiyaggaṁ phusissatāyaṁ kumāro,So dhammacakkaṁ paramavisuddhadassī;Vattessatāyaṁ bahujanahitānukampī,Vitthārikassa bhavissati brahmacariyaṁ.
snp3.11:694: Mamañca āyu na ciramidhāvaseso,Athantarā me bhavissati kālakiriyā;Sohaṁ na sossaṁ asamadhurassa dhammaṁ,Tenamhi aṭṭo byasanaṅgato aghāvī".
snp3.11:695: So sākiyānaṁ vipulaṁ janetvā pītiṁ,Antepuramhā niggamā brahmacārī;So bhāgineyyaṁ sayaṁ anukampamāno,Samādapesi asamadhurassa dhamme.
snp3.11:696: "Buddhoti ghosaṁ yada parato suṇāsi,Sambodhipatto vivarati dhammamaggaṁ;Gantvāna tattha samayaṁ paripucchamāno,Carassu tasmiṁ bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ".
snp3.11:697: Tenānusiṭṭho hitamanena tādinā,Anāgate paramavisuddhadassinā;So nālako upacitapuññasañcayo,Jinaṁ patikkhaṁ parivasi rakkhitindriyo.
snp3.11:698: Sutvāna ghosaṁ jinavaracakkavattane,Gantvāna disvā isinisabhaṁ pasanno;Moneyyaseṭṭhaṁ munipavaraṁ apucchi,Samāgate asitāvhayassa sāsaneti.
snp3.11:699: "Aññātametaṁ vacanaṁ,Asitassa yathātathaṁ;Taṁ taṁ gotama pucchāmi,Sabbadhammāna pāraguṁ.
snp3.11:700: Anagāriyupetassa,Bhikkhācariyaṁ jigīsato;Muni pabrūhi me puṭṭho,Moneyyaṁ uttamaṁ padaṁ".
snp3.11:701: "Moneyyaṁ te upaññissaṁ,Dukkaraṁ durabhisambhavaṁ;Handa te naṁ pavakkhāmi,Santhambhassu daḷho bhava.
snp3.11:702: Samānabhāgaṁ kubbetha,Gāme akkuṭṭhavanditaṁ;Manopadosaṁ rakkheyya,Santo anuṇṇato care.
snp3.11:703: Uccāvacā niccharanti,Dāye aggisikhūpamā;Nāriyo muniṁ palobhenti,Tā su taṁ mā palobhayuṁ.
snp3.11:704: Virato methunā dhammā,Hitvā kāme paropare;Aviruddho asāratto,Pāṇesu tasathāvare.
snp3.11:705: Yathā ahaṁ tathā ete,Yathā ete tathā ahaṁ;Attānaṁ upamaṁ katvā,Na haneyya na ghātaye.
snp3.11:706: Hitvā icchañca lobhañca,Yattha satto puthujjano;Cakkhumā paṭipajjeyya,Tareyya narakaṁ imaṁ.
snp3.11:707: Ūnūdaro mitāhāro,Appicchassa alolupo;Sadā icchāya nicchāto,Aniccho hoti nibbuto.
snp3.11:709: Sa jhānapasuto dhīro,Vanante ramito siyā;Jhāyetha rukkhamūlasmiṁ,Attānamabhitosayaṁ.
snp3.11:711: Na munī gāmamāgamma,Kulesu sahasā care;Ghāsesanaṁ chinnakatho,Na vācaṁ payutaṁ bhaṇe.
snp3.11:712: Alatthaṁ yadidaṁ sādhu,Nālatthaṁ kusalaṁ iti;Ubhayeneva so tādī,Rukkhaṁvupanivattati.
snp3.11:713: Sa pattapāṇi vicaranto,Amūgo mūgasammato;Appaṁ dānaṁ na hīḷeyya,Dātāraṁ nāvajāniyā.
snp3.11:714: Uccāvacā hi paṭipadā,Samaṇena pakāsitā;Na pāraṁ diguṇaṁ yanti,Nayidaṁ ekaguṇaṁ mutaṁ.
snp3.11:715: Yassa ca visatā natthi,Chinnasotassa bhikkhuno;Kiccākiccappahīnassa,Pariḷāho na vijjati.
snp3.11:716: Moneyyaṁ te upaññissaṁ,Khuradhārūpamo bhave;Jivhāya tālumāhacca,Udare saññato siyā.
snp3.11:717: Alīnacitto ca siyā,Na cāpi bahu cintaye;Nirāmagandho asito,Brahmacariyaparāyaṇo.
snp3.11:718: Ekāsanassa sikkhetha,Samaṇūpāsanassa ca;Ekattaṁ monamakkhātaṁ,Eko ce abhiramissasi;Atha bhāhisi dasadisā.
snp3.11:719: Sutvā dhīrānaṁ nighosaṁ,Jhāyīnaṁ kāmacāginaṁ;Tato hiriñca saddhañca,Bhiyyo kubbetha māmako.
snp3.11:720: Taṁ nadīhi vijānātha,Sobbhesu padaresu ca;Saṇantā yanti kusobbhā,Tuṇhī yanti mahodadhī.
snp3.11:721: Yadūnakaṁ taṁ saṇati,Yaṁ pūraṁ santameva taṁ;Aḍḍhakumbhūpamo bālo,Rahado pūrova paṇḍito.
snp3.11:722: Yaṁ samaṇo bahuṁ bhāsati,Upetaṁ atthasañhitaṁ;Jānaṁ so dhammaṁ deseti,Jānaṁ so bahu bhāsati.
snp3.11:723: Yo ca jānaṁ saṁyatatto,Jānaṁ na bahu bhāsati;Sa munī monamarahati,Sa munī monamajjhagā"ti.
